questions.question: Which of the following is a primary application of LLMs?
options: Predicting stock market trends
Conducting automatic hardware diagnostics
Solving mathematical equations
Generating text based on given prompts
questions.correct_answer: Generating text based on given prompts

questions.question: Which of the following best describes a large language model (LLM)?
options: It is a type of machine learning model that processes and generates human-like text.
It is a database system optimized for handling large volumes of text data.
It is a specialized networking model that processes data from different sources.
It is a software tool used primarily for data encryption.
questions.correct_answer: It is a type of machine learning model that processes and generates human-like text.

questions.question: What makes transformers special in handling text?
options: They can pay attention to all parts of the sentence at once.
They can read and write text simultaneously.
They work better with numbers than with words.
They focus only on the most recent word in a sentence.
questions.correct_answer: They can pay attention to all parts of the sentence at once.

questions.question: Which technologies have advanced the operation of LLMs?
options: High-performance parallel computing
Machine learning and artificial neural networks
Distributed ledger technology
Biometric analysis techniques
questions.correct_answer: Machine learning and artificial neural networks

questions.question: Why is a large amount of data important for training large language models (LLMs)?
options: It decreases the model's reliance on internet connectivity.
Large datasets reduce the model's speed, making it more thorough in processing text.
It helps the model to improve its accuracy by learning from a wide variety of text examples.
Large data sets are required to meet regulatory compliance for data storage.
questions.correct_answer: It helps the model to improve its accuracy by learning from a wide variety of text examples.
